name: Invite KlickTipp Contacts to Circle Automatically
description:
This automation connects KlickTipp with Circle to streamline your community onboarding. Whenever a KlickTipp webhook event is fired—such as a tag being applied, a form submission, or a specific workflow trigger—the scenario takes the contact’s email and name and automatically sends them an invitation to your Circle community.

The template ensures that new leads or customers coming from KlickTipp are seamlessly onboarded into the correct Circle spaces without manual effort. As soon as the event occurs, the contact is invited to your predefined Circle community and space, making the transition from email subscriber to community member completely automated.

This flow is ideal for course creators, coaches, membership owners, or any business using KlickTipp to collect leads or process signups. It guarantees a smooth and consistent onboarding experience, reduces workload, and avoids delays when granting access to your Circle community.

By using this template, you maintain a fully automated and reliable bridge between KlickTipp and Circle—turning contacts into invited community members instantly and effortlessly.
